events.message: The insured reported a collision incident involving their car on the highway resulting in substantial front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning a vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned promptly to manage the claim and assist the customer through the process.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the company and confirmation sent to the claimant's email.
We have requested the customer to provide the police report, photos of the damage, and vehicle registration papers.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos were submitted timely by the claimant.
An investigation into the collision circumstances has started with a focus on liability and damage assessment.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault, and the damage assessment is complete.
A settlement offer covering all repair costs has been proposed to the claimant for review and approval.
The claimant responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and process.
The settlement has been approved by the claims department following confirmation from the customer.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued and transferred to the claimant's designated bank account.
The claim file has been closed after final payment and confirmation that all issues have been resolved.
The case has been archived for future reference as per the companyâ€™s record retention policies.
